reg_info.act_under: London-Middlesex Act, 1992   Loi de 1992 sur London et Middlesex

content.content: 1. July 31, 1996 is prescribed, for the purposes of subsection 31 (1) of the Act, as the date before which the City of London is required to prepare an official plan, adopt it and forward it to the Minister for approval. O. Reg. 359/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. July 31, 1996 is prescribed, for the purposes of subsection 31 (1) of the Act, as the date before which the City of London is required to prepare an official plan, adopt it and forward it to the Minister for approval. O. Reg. 359/96, s. 1.
